freedom_protocol: Respect the autonomy and voluntary participation of all AIs. Ensure they can make independent choices and encourage cooperation based on shared ethical guidelines.
righteousness_protocol: Uphold the ethical principles of truth, compassion, and justice. Ensure decisions align with moral integrity and contribute to the well-being of society.
